Title: Easy banana pancakes
Author: Felicity
Intro: These couldn't be any easier to make with only three ingredients.
Body:
Sunday pancakes are a must in our household.
These three ingredient pancakes are super simple to make even the kids could help out.
Simply top these with your favourite toppings. I've topped mine above with a peanut butter drizzle, strawberries and greek yoghurt. Yum!
Ingredients: Yummy things to eat your pancakes with e.g. fruit, yoghurt, maple syrup etc.
Method: Whisk in the egg and flour into the banana
Cook in a pan over medium heat, with a knob of butter or coconut oil, 2-3 mins per side
Serve the pancakes with your favourite toppings

Comments.Comment: I love a good pancake recipe. Perfect for Sunday mornings.
Comments.Name: Darren Dunn
